title: SEC names chief financial officer - Farmville - Farmville Herald
content: SEC names chief financial officer - Farmville  Farmville Herald
description: Carol B. Myers has taken over as Southside Electric Cooperative’s (SEC) new chief financial officer, the first woman to hold that senior management position in SEC’s 85-year history. Myers began her duties April 30 after being appointed by SEC’s incoming CEO Jason Loehr. As chief financial officer, Myers will oversee the Cooperative’s accounting, billing, purchasing, […]
